# apptrust_application_package_bindings (Data Source)

Returns a list of packages bound to the specified application.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apptrust_application_package_bindings" "example" {
  application_key = "my-web-app"
}

output "packages" {
  value = data.apptrust_application_package_bindings.example.packages
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_key` (String) The application key.

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Pagination limit.
- `name` (String) Filter by package name.
- `offset` (Number) Pagination offset.
- `type` (String) Filter by package type (e.g. maven, docker, npm).

### Read-Only

- `packages` (Attributes List) List of bound packages. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--packages))
- `pagination` (Attributes) Pagination info. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--pagination))

<a id="nestedatt--packages"></a>
### Nested Schema for `packages`

Read-Only:

- `latest_version` (String) Latest version.
- `name` (String) Package name.
- `num_versions` (Number) Number of versions bound.
- `type` (String) Package type.


<a id="nestedatt--pagination"></a>
### Nested Schema for `pagination`

Read-Only:

- `limit` (Number) Limit used.
- `offset` (Number) Offset used.
- `total_items` (Number) Total items.
